text: Abo bankonya ngokunyoluka oko uAllâh Abaphe kona kuvela kwiziBele zaKhe mabangacingi okokuba (obo) bugogotya (babo buyinto) elungileyo. Nakanye, buya kuba bubi gqitha, izinto ababezibambile, bekhukhusheka nazo ngokunyoluka, ziza kubotshelelwa ezintanyeni zabo njengekhola ngoMhla woVuko. Kananjalo ilifa lamazulu nomhlaba lelika-Allâh; kwaye uAllâh Ukwazi kakuhle konke oko nikwenzayo
